db:abstract.db:para: Define a playback variation for sounds. So each time the playback of the same sound can be a slightly different even with the same AudioSample.

db:para.db:emphasis: This type is under development and is subject to change.

db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in Qt 5.0.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: PlayVariation must be defined inside a Sound or be added to it using Sound.addPlayVariation() if PlayVariation is created dynamically.

db:section.db:title: looping : bool
db:section.db:para: This property indicates whether the playback will be looped or not.

db:section.db:title: maxGain : real
db:section.db:para: This property specifies the maximum gain adjustment that can be applied in any playback.

db:section.db:title: maxPitch : real
db:section.db:para: This property specifies the maximum pitch adjustment that can be applied in any playback.

db:section.db:title: minGain : real
db:section.db:para: This property specifies the minimum gain adjustment that can be applied in any playback.

db:section.db:title: minPitch : real
db:section.db:para: This property specifies the minimum pitch adjustment that can be applied in any playback.

db:section.db:title: sample : string
db:section.db:para: This property specifies which AudioSample this variation will use.
